definition: line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Professionalizing social work is needed to build harmonic community in Henan.
sentences.chinese: 河南省社會工作職業化是構建和諧河南的需要。

sentences.english: It is the consensus of Chinese competitive tennis circle that the tennis game should be professionalized now.
sentences.chinese: 走職業化道路，是中國競技網球多年來無爭的取向。

sentences.english: The mechanism of professional manager is considered as an inevitable option for the professionalization of private enterprise management.
sentences.chinese: 職業經理制是民營企業管理職業化的必然選擇。

sentences.english: They expect some degree of professionalism.
A common pattern considered very professional is the pin-stripe.
sentences.chinese: 比較職業化的一般樣式是條紋狀的。

sentences.english: Another was the growing professionalization of scientific activity.
sentences.chinese: 另一個結果便是科研活動的職業化。

sentences.english: It is a trend for the presidents of the newly founded universities to professionalize themselves.
sentences.chinese: 校長職業化發展是大學尤其是新建本科院校的趨勢。

sentences.english: Another was the growing professionalisation of scientific activity.
sentences.chinese: 另一現象是科研活動的日益職業化。

sentences.english: Is there any possibility for an unprofessional person?
sentences.chinese: 一個職業化程度不高的人而留嗎？

sentences.english: The health-law performing system doesn t meet the need of professionalization.
sentences.chinese: 衛生執法隊伍還沒有按照職業化的要求進行制度建設。

sentences.english: How to realize it is a big difficulty the Chinese safeguard industry is facing.
sentences.chinese: 如何實現職業化是中國保安業面臨的一大難題。

sentences.english: The principal performers of the Song ci-poetry were occupational and professional singsong girls.
sentences.chinese: 宋詞主要的演唱者，是職業化與專業化的歌妓。

sentences.english: Another change brought about by the professionalized league is the involvement of foreign athletes.
sentences.chinese: 職業化聯賽帶來的另一個變化是外國隊員的加入。

sentences.english: Along with the development of government by law, public prosecutor's professionalization also consummates day by day.
sentences.chinese: 隨着法治的發展，檢察官的職業化也日趨完善。

sentences.english: The New-China Troupe is a folk Troupe forced to the path of professionalization.
sentences.chinese: 新中國劇社是被迫走上職業化之路的民間職業劇團。

definition: lit. to cross five passes and slay six generals (idiom)/fig. to surmount all difficulties (on the way to success)
pinyin: guo4 wu3 guan1 zhan3 liu4 jiang4

definition: to put forward plans and ideas (also derogatory)/to give advice (idiom)
all-round education (contrasted with 應試教育|应试教育[ying4 shi4 jiao4 yu4], exam-oriented education)
highest common factor HCF/greatest common divisor GCD
to run a newspaper/to publish a newspaper

pinyin: Guang3 dong1 Wai4 yu3 Wai4 mao4 Da4 xue2
